Name: 巴伦西亚传说：索菲亚的重生 Valencia Saga:Sophia's rebirth
About the game: This game is developed by a single individual through three years time. At the very beginning, this game was a fangame. After neccessary modifications, I released this game. You are offered a rare item in the game as a special thanks for purchasing this edition.( easy and normal mode limited) It is my sincere hope that players can experience the charm of traditional SRPG. This game salutes traditional SRPG. Make your plans, and manipulate your charactors so that you can clear all the stages. This game is rather difficult and would take you some time. There is an easy mode indeed, but might also be difficult for some. Please consider before you choose if you want a relaxing game. There might be bugs in the game, and I will try to fix them as soon as you discover them. Unable to initialize the game: please check if your audio device is working all right (earphone or stereo) E-mail：751510917@qq.com
